com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form

Class FormSingleSelectStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.FormStep
      • com.hypernovalabs.multichoiceform.form.FormSingleSelectStep

  • public class FormSingleSelectStep
extends FormStep
    Single Select Form Step. Provides a list of options and returns only one selected option. Child of FormStep.
